summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5838 for the improvement of 28th Avenue South, from Graham Street to Raymond Street on the west; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76996, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
